remarks: The power series variable function is injective if the base ring is nonzero.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2014.)
statement:
mvrf.s $e |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) $.
mvrf.v $e |- V = ( I mVar R ) $.
mvrf.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
mvrf.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
mvrf.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
mvrf1.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
mvrf1.o $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
mvrf1.n $e |- ( ph -> .1. =/= .0. ) $.
mvrf1 $p |- ( ph -> V : I -1-1-> B ) $.
